page.title: 02FARMING STRACATHRO
page.content:
My name is Don. My dad works on a farm. In the summer he does the harvest and dad puts all the grain into big grain bins .
After the summer is the autumn when my dad ploughs the fields and seeds them with a seeder.He has two John Deeres and a Massey Ferguson.
In the winter my dad has to feed the sheep with hay and has to clear the roads with a snowplough.After the winter all the crops are coming on fine but you have to watch out for the doos.You have to put screaming bangers in the fields to keep them off.
